data.trans_hint: Thật là độc ác cho một đứa trẻ khi nhìn thấy gia đình của mình tan vỡ.
data.en_hint: It is cruel for a child to see his family break down.
data.content_game_1: It is cruel for a child to see his family break down.
data.answer_en_hint: It is cruel for a child to see his family break down.

data.trans: Kéo ra, rời khỏi, rút khỏi
data.trans_hint: Một tuần trước khi thỏa thuận được kí kết, mười lăm ngân hàng Nhật Bản đã có động thái rút khỏi giao dịch.
data.en_hint: The week before the deal was supposed to close, fifteen Japanese banks made a move to pull out.
data.content_game_1: The week before the deal was supposed to close, fifteen Japanese banks made a move to pull out.
data.answer_en_hint: The week before the deal was supposed to close, fifteen Japanese banks made a move to pull out.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã rút khỏi thỏa thuận vào phút cuối.
data.en_hint: He backed out of the deal at the last minute.
data.content_game_1: He backed out of the deal at the last minute.
data.answer_en_hint: He backed out of the deal at the last minute.

data.trans: Không hoàn thành, dang dở, thất bại
data.trans_hint: Kế hoạch của cô thất bại vì thiếu tiền.
data.en_hint: Her plans fell through because of lack of money.
data.content_game_1: Her plans fell through because of lack of money.
data.answer_en_hint: Her plans fell through because of lack of money.

data.trans: Tiến lên, thăng tiến, tiếp tục
data.trans_hint: Không rõ liệu cuộc họp có diễn ra theo kế hoạch hay không.
data.en_hint: It is unclear whether the meeting will go ahead as planned.
data.content_game_1: It is unclear whether the meeting will go ahead as planned.
data.answer_en_hint: It is unclear whether the meeting will go ahead as planned.

data.trans: Mua lại của ai đó (cổ phần, một phần công ty/tòa nhà,...)
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã thành công thuyết phục được năm cổ đông bán cho chúng tôi cổ phần của họ. Chúng tôi chỉ cần mua lại của cô ấy và chúng tôi sẽ nắm quyền kiểm soát công ty.
data.en_hint: We managed to persuade the five shareholders to sell us their shares. We just need to buy her out, and we will take the control of the company.
data.content_game_1: We managed to persuade the five shareholders to sell us their shares. We just need to buy her out, and we will take the control of the company.
data.answer_en_hint: We managed to persuade the five shareholders to sell us their shares. We just need to buy her out, and we will take the control of the company.

data.trans: Huy động (sức mạnh, sự giúp đỡ,...)
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi cần huy động tất cả sức mạnh của mình để khiến việc kinh doanh này không phá sản.
data.en_hint: We need to call on all of our strength to keep the business from going bankrupt.
data.content_game_1: We need to call on all of our strength to keep the business from going bankrupt.
data.answer_en_hint: We need to call on all of our strength to keep the business from going bankrupt.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đang trên bờ vực giải thể doanh nghiệp khi cô ấy xuất hiện và nói rằng cô ta có thể xoay chuyển tình thế kinh doanh.
data.en_hint: We were on the verge of winding down the company when she appeared and said that she could turned the business around.
data.content_game_1: We were on the verge of winding down the company when she appeared and said that she could turned the business around.
data.answer_en_hint: We were on the verge of winding down the company when she appeared and said that she could turned the business around.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy liên tục hối thúc việc tiếp quản như thể anh ta có kế hoạch gì đó trong đầu.
data.en_hint: He kept pressing ahead with the takeover as if he had something planned in mind.
data.content_game_1: He kept pressing ahead with the takeover as if he had something planned in mind.
data.answer_en_hint: He kept pressing ahead with the takeover as if he had something planned in mind.

data.trans_hint: Người quản lý trấn an chúng tôi khi anh ấy nói rằng không ai bị sa thải cả,
data.en_hint: The manager put our mind at ease when he said that no one was made redundant.
data.content_game_1: The manager put our mind at ease when he said that no one was made redundant.
data.answer_en_hint: The manager put our mind at ease when he said that no one was made redundant.

data.trans_hint: Sự việc từ chức của giám đốc đã làm chậm cả quá trình mua lại.
data.en_hint: The resignation of the director has set back the whole buyout process.
data.content_game_1: The resignation of the director has set back the whole buyout process.
data.answer_en_hint: The resignation of the director has set back the whole buyout process.
